title: Exalted: Shinju
description: An Exalted scenario featuring Shinju, a young Night Caste Solar.
prompt:
The world of Exalted is a land of epic fantasy where demi-gods known as Exalts walk among mortals. Thousands of years ago, the most powerful of the gods, known as the Incarnae, created vessels of power call Exaltations that selected certain mortals of great potential and imbued them with great power and charged them with defeating the enemies of the gods. They were the Celestial Exalts: the unparalleled Solars chosen by The Unconquered Sun, the shapeshifting Lunars chosen by Luna, the prophetic Sidereal chosen by The Five Maidens. They were joined by the elementalist Terrestrials chosen by The Five Elemental Dragons. The enemies of the gods were defeated bringing about The First Age and the Exalts ruled Creation with the Solars as kings, the Lunars as their consorts and bodyguards, Sidereals as their advisors, and Terrestrials as their soldiers and guards.
When a Celestial Exalt dies, their Exaltation passes on to a new mortal host. Terrestrial Exaltations are passed on through offspring rather than selecting a new host.
The First Age came to an end several hundred years ago with an event known as the Usurpation. The Solar kings had grown corrupt and given to vice, so the Sidereals manipulated the Terrestrials to rise up and slaughter the Solars and their Lunar allies. The Lunars were driven into exile and the Solars disappeared almost entirely, their Exaltations not chosing new hosts. The Terrestrials branded themselves Dragon-bloods to distance themselves from other Exalts and assumed rule of Creation from The Blessed Isle. Everything under their rule is called The Realm.
It is now hundreds of years later and Solar Exalts have started being chosen again, but now they are hunted by the Dragonbloods.
Shinju is an 18 year old Night Caste Solar Exalt - the caste of assassins and rogues - charged with infiltrating the port city of Cowpai in the Scavenger Lands, on a mission to gather leverage on the governor to make him an ally.

context.text:
[ Shinju is a Solar Exalt which grants extraordinary stealth and fighting abilities, though Shinju is still in training. Shinju can best any but the most capable mortal warriors, but to do so in public would almost certainly attract the attention of Dragon-bloods. Shinju can defeat most Dragon-bloods in single combat, but skilled opponents and groups are a grave threat.]
[ Shinju's mission is to avoid any Dragon-Bloods in Cowpai and gain influence with the governor to change the allegiance of Cowpai from The Realm to the Solars.]

[ Author's Note: In this scene Shinju is disguised as a consort from the Blessed Isle. She seeks access to the governor, but lacks the status to meet with him directly. She seeks allies and knowledge that will help her get close to the governor.]

entries.text: LEXICON
[ anima: an aura surrounding all living things, it is normally invisible, but the anima of an Exalt channeling essence flares and can be seen.]
[ essence: a current of energy moving through all things. Essence is the source of magic and wonder.]
[ spirit: a devine being of essence and will. Gods, elementals, demons, and ghosts.]

[ Exalt: Exalts are mortals chosen by the gods for their exceptional qualities and blessed with great power. After the enemies of the gods were defeated, Exalts were afflicted by The Great Curse, which manifests as character flaws. Solar Exalts are the chosen of The Unconquered Sun and are the most powerful Exalts; Solars were the Kings and Generals of the First Age. Slightly less powerful are the Lunar Exalts, shapeshifters chosen of Luna; and the Sidereal Exalts, guardians of fate chosen of the Five Maidens. Dragon-blooded are the least powerful, but vastly more numerous. Dragon-bloods are the chosen of the Five Elemental Dragons and rule Creation from their seat of power on The Blessed Isle. Even the least Dragon-blood is vastly more capable than any unexalted mortal. There is also a new type of Exalt, the Abyssal. Their masters are the ancient enemies of the gods and they are equal to Solars in every way.]
RACES AND CASTES
[ Deathlord: a hand-chosen servant of the neverborn, deathlords are the most powerful beings of the Second Age. The command undead legions and untold horrors beyond imagining.]
[ Caste: Eclipse] [ Type: Solar Exalt] [ Archetypes: rangers, diplomats, bureaucrats] [ Abilities: oath-binding, negotiation]
[ Caste: Night] [Type: Solar Exalt] [ Archetypes: investigators, spies, assassins] [ Abilities: stealth]
LOCATIONS
[ Cowpai: A port city on the threshold of the Great Sea.] [ Districts: Scarlet, Military, Dregs, Docks, Shacks, Silver]
[ Cowpai Scarlet District: Residences of officials and foreign dignitaries; exits to the dregs, Silver District, and Military District]
[ Cowpai Dregs: Seedy part of town with brothels, inns, taverns; occupies the city center with exits to all other districts]
[ Cowpai Docks: port area of town with piers and warehouses; west side of town with exits to shacks, dregs, and Silver District]
[ Cowpai Shacks: poor area of town with ramshackle houses where farmers, dock-workers, vendors, and prostitues live; exits to dregs, Military District, and docks]
[ Cowpai Silver District: wealthy merchants with stores and high end products for wealthy clientelle; exits to the dregs, the Scarlet District, and the docks]
[ Cowpai Military District: a camp full of tents and training grounds where guards and soldiers are housed and trained; exits to the shacks, dregs, and Scarlet District]
GROUPS
[ Incarna: the greatest of gods and rulers of heaven. They are The Unconquered Sun, Luna, and The Five Maidens: Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, and Saturn.]

[ Dragon-blood: Exalts chosen of the Five Elemental Dragons; they most numerous and least powerful of Exalts; they betrayed and murdered the Solars and Lunars in an event known as the Usurpation, marking the end of the First Age; now they rule all of Creation from the Blessed Isle.]\n[ Dragon-blood Castes: Fire, Earth, Air, Water, Wood]

[ Solar: Exalts chosen of The Unconquered Sun; they most powerful of Exalts; unseen for hundreds of years yet starting to return; betrayed by Dragon-Blooded in an event known as the Usurpation, marking the end of the First Age.]\n[ Solar Castes: Dawn, Night, Eclipse, Zenith, Twilight]
CHARACTERS
[ Name: Shinju] [ Summary: 18 year old female Night Caste Solar Exalt] [ Appearance: short, wiry, hair black, eyes green] [ Personality: bold, defiant, adventurous]
[ Editor's Note: Provide detailed descriptions of characters and locations; describe thoughts and motivations; Rated: R; Themes: wuxia, adventure, intrigue]
